metadata.Title: CVE-2020-20451 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
Denial of Service issue in FFmpeg 4.2 due to resource management errors via fftools/cmdutils.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-20451` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec-extra60 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec60 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavdevice60 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter-extra9 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter9 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat-extra60 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat60 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavutil58 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libpostproc57 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libswresample4 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libswscale7 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2').
